translation.fet-feature-infrared-ir-receiver-beam-ra: Synkroniserar soundbaren till tv:ns fjärrkontroll för smidig styrning
translation.fet-feature-voltage-auto-switching-100-2: Automatisk växling 100–240 V, 50/60 Hz AC universalingång
translation.fet-feature-apple-airplay2-description: Fungerar med AirPlay 2 på Appleenheter med iOS 11.4 eller senare
translation.fet-feature-apple-airplay2-on-wifi: Fungerar med AirPlay 2 på Apple-enheter med iOS 11.4 eller senare om Wi-Fi-ansluten
translation.fet-feature-voice-beam: Fungerar med Sonos Voice Control, Amazon Alexa och Google Assistent
translation.fet-feature-voice-era-100-era-300: Fungerar med Sonos Voice Control och Amazon Alexa. Tjänsters tillgänglighet varierar mellan olika länder och språk.
translation.fet-feature-voice-prima: Fungerar med Amazon Alexa och Google Assistent vid Wi-Fi-anslutning. Använd Sonos Voice Control vid Wi-Fi-anslutning och för de vanligaste uppspelningskontrollerna medan du streamar via Bluetooth.
translation.fet-feature-tv-compatibility-description: Inte kompatibel med CCFL-bakgrundsbelysta tv-apparater (tillverkningsår 2004–2012)
translation.fet-feature-battery-roam2: Batteri på 18 Wh ger upp till 10 timmars oavbruten speltid med en enda laddning vid uppspelning på måttliga volymer.
translation.fet-feature-battery-prima: Batteri på 44 Wh ger upp till 24 timmars oavbruten speltid med en enda laddning.
translation.fet-feature-charging-roam2: Använd den medföljande USB-C till USB-C-laddningskabeln tillsammans med en kompatibel nätadapter på minst 10 W. Du kan också använda den trådlösa laddaren för Sonos Roam eller en Qi-certifierad trådlös laddare.
translation.fet-feature-charging-prima: Använd den medföljande trådlösa strömbasen eller en kompatibel USB-C-PD-laddare.
translation.fet-arc-description: Lev dig in i handlingen i tv-program, filmer och spel med kristallklart tal och två höjdkanaler som ger en otrolig känsla av rymd. När tv:n är avstängd kan du streama musik och mycket mer från alla dina favorittjänster. Styr enkelt soundbaren med din befintliga fjärrkontroll, Sonosappen, rösten eller Apple AirPlay 2. Skapa ett komplett surroundsystem med en subwoofer och två bakre högtalare och lägg till Sonoshögtalare runt om i hemmet för att lyssna i flera rum. Allt fungerar tillsammans via Wi-Fi.
translation.fet-beam-description: Få kristallklart tal i tv-program, filmer och spel, och streama musik från alla dina favorittjänster. Avancerad bearbetning ger rymligt ljud som skapar en virtuell surroundupplevelse med Dolby Atmos.¹ Kom igång med Beam på bara några minuter och styr enkelt med Sonosappen, fjärrkontrollen till tv:n och rösten.² Du kan när som helst lägga till en subwoofer och bakre högtalare för att få ännu mer omslutande surroundljud. Skapa enkelt ett uppkopplat system för hela hemmet genom att lägga till Sonoshögtalare i flera rum.
translation.fet-five-description: Förhöj musikupplevelsen med kristallklart och omfångsrikt stereoljud. Uppfatta varenda ton och känn vartenda trumslag när du streamar ljudformat med högsta möjliga upplösning från dina favorittjänster. Anslut enkelt en vinylspelare, cd-spelare eller annan enhet via Fives inbyggda 3,5 mm ljudingång. Mixa och matcha olika Sonoshögtalare för att lyssna i flera rum. Allt fungerar tillsammans via Wi-Fi.
translation.fet-gravity-description: Få en större ljudupplevelse från tv, musik och mer med kraftfull bas när du kopplar ihop Sub Mini med Beam, Ray, Era 100, One eller One SL. Placera den var som helst i rummet, installera enkelt med Sonosappen och upplev ett fylligare och mer omslutande ljud helt utan brus.
translation.fet-prima-description: Släpp musikupplevelsen fri med Move 2. Detta bärbara kraftpaket har uppgraderats både inuti och utanpå och spelar pulshöjande stereoljud precis var du vill. Få upp till 24 timmars kontinuerlig speltid.¹ Högtalaren är IP56-klassad, vilket betyder att den är både damm- och fukttålig och därmed perfekt för användning utomhus. Placera bara Move 2 på den medföljande trådlösa strömbasen när batteriet behöver laddas.
translation.fet-optimo1-description: Spela enkelt upp allt ditt ljudinnehåll via Wi-Fi och Bluetooth®.¹ Anslut en vinylspelare eller annan enhet med en AUX-kabel och Sonos linjeingångsadapter.² Styr med rösten utan att använda händerna. Koppla ihop två stycken i samma rum för att få ännu fylligare stereoljud eller omslutande surroundljud för hemmabion. Lägg till fler Sonoshögtalare runt om i hemmet för att få fantastiskt ljud i alla rum.
translation.fet-optimo2-description: Kom ännu närmare allt du lyssnar på med kristallklart och rymligt ljud. Streama från alla dina favorittjänster och enheter via Wi-Fi och Bluetooth.¹ Anslut en vinylspelare eller annan ljudkälla med en AUX-kabel och Sonos linjeingångsadapter.² Upplev verklighetstroget surroundljud genom att ansluta två Era 300-högtalare till en Arc eller Arc Ultra och streama rymligt ljud med Dolby Atmos.³ Det är enkelt att installera och ännu enklare att styra med Sonosappen, nydesignade touchkontroller och rösten.
translation.fet-ray-description: Upplev perfekt balanserat ljud, inklusive tydlig dialog och fyllig bas, plus enkel styrning med tv:ns fjärrkontroll, Sonosappen, Apple AirPlay 2 med mera. Allt som krävs för att komma igång är två kablar och några minuter av din tid. Det framåtriktade ljudet gör Ray särskilt lämplig för trånga utrymmen, som en hylla i tv-möbeln. Utnyttja möjligheten att bygga upp Sonossystemet du vill ha över tid genom att lägga till högtalare för att skapa surroundljud eller lyssna i flera rum.
translation.fet-roam2-description: Roam 2 är otroligt lätt, tålig och kraftfull och gör det enkelt att lyssna på förstklassigt Sonosljud var du än är. Bara anslut så kan du spela musik i farten. Få upp till 10 timmar med djup bas och förvånansvärt klart ljud för det lilla formatet.¹ Roam 2 har IP67-klassat skydd mot damm och vätska och är redo för utomhusbruk.² Anslut till Wi-Fi via Sonosappen när du är hemma för att få tillgång till fler funktioner och använda den som en smart högtalare.³
translation.fet-duke-description: Sonos Ace tar den personliga musikupplevelsen till en ny nivå. Känn varje frekvens med överlägsen precision och klarhet. Maximera känslan av att omslutas av ljud med losslesstreaming, rymligt ljud med dynamisk huvudspårning och aktiv brusreducering i världsklass. Hör vad som händer omkring dig med transparensläget. Få upp till 30 timmars batteritid, fantastisk passform och kristallklara samtal.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-beam-1: Streama Dolby Atmos-musik via Wi-Fi med utvalda låtar från tjänster som stöds. Upplev Dolby Atmos-innehåll för hemmabion med en kompatibel tv och en HDMI eARC- eller HDMI ARC-anslutning. Se https://support.sonos.com/sv-se/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos för ytterligare information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-beam-2: Rösttjänsters tillgänglighet varierar mellan olika länder och språk.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-optimo1-optimo2-1: Streama Dolby Atmos-musik via Wi-Fi med utvalda låtar från tjänster som stöds. Upplev Dolby Atmos-innehåll för hemmabion med en kompatibel tv och en HDMI eARC- eller HDMI ARC-anslutning. Se https://support.sonos.com/sv-se/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos för ytterligare information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-optimo1-optimo2-2: Rösttjänsters tillgänglighet varierar mellan olika länder och språk.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-optimo1-optimo2-3: Streama Dolby Atmos-musik via Wi-Fi med en kompatibel tjänst och innehåll som stöds. Se https://support.sonos.com/sv-se/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos för ytterligare information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-5: Sonosappen och en kompatibel soundbar från Sonos krävs. Se faq.sonos.com/sonos-ace/tv-swap för ytterligare information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-1: Sonos Ace måste vara registrerade i Sonosappen för att huvudspårning ska fungera. Rymligt ljud kräver en kompatibel enhet och kompatibelt innehåll. Mer information finns på faq.sonos.com/spatial-requirements.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-2: Losslessljud kräver en kompatibel enhet och kompatibelt innehåll. Mer information finns på faq.sonos.com/lossless-requirements.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-3: Batteritiden påverkas av användning, inställningar och andra faktorer.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-4: Snabbladdning från 0 % batteritid erbjuder ungefär 3 timmars lyssnings- eller taltid på 3 minuter.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-roam2-2: Högtalaren är vattentät ned till en meters djup i upp till 30 minuter.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-roam2-1: Uppskattat för måttliga volymnivåer. Batteritiden påverkas av användning, inställningar, omgivning och andra faktorer.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-roam2-3: Sonosappen och Wi-Fi krävs för att detta ska fungera. Alla funktioner är inte tillgängliga på Bluetooth
translation.fet-sub-description: Hör minsta lilla detalj i musiken och få gåshud när du tittar på tv och filmer. Kom igång på bara några minuter med Sonosappen. Appen ansluter Sub till systemet via Wi-Fi så att du kan placera den var som helst i rummet. Placera den stående eller lägg den på sidan och skjut in den under soffan för att få kraftfull bas utan förvrängning.
translation.fet-amp-description: Använd Trueplay™ för att justera högtalarna efter rummets unika akustik. Placera olika Sonoshögtalare runt om i hemmet och lyssna på omslutande ljud från musik, tv, filmer med mera i flera rum. Allt fungerar tillsammans via Wi-Fi och det är enkelt att styra med Sonosappen och Apple AirPlay 2.
translation.fet-header-intro-duke: Premiär för Sonos Ace. Allt du vill ha i ett par hörlurar.
translation.fet-slide-2-body-duke: Upplev musiken på djupet genom att streama losslessljud via Bluetooth® eller USB-C. Låt musikupplevelsen omsluta dig med otroligt realistiskt, rymligt ljud som omfamnar dig.
translation.fet-slide-3-headline-duke: Ljudet du vill ha utan bruset du vill slippa
translation.fet-slide-3-body-duke: Aktiv brusreducering i världsklass upptäcker och neutraliserar externa ljud med hög precision för en maximalt omslutande musikupplevelse. Aktivera transparensläget för att höra vad som händer omkring dig
translation.fet-slide-4-body-duke: Mjuka öronkuddar i memory foam skapar en akustisk barriär och minimerar trycket. Bandet i rostfritt stål kan göras längre och öronkåporna kan roteras, för perfekt passform.
translation.fet-slide-5-body-duke: Mikrofoner med strålformning riktar in sig på din röst och dämpar bakgrundsljud, så att alla ord är klara och tydliga.
translation.fet-slide-6-headline-duke: En häpnadsväckande detaljrik och omslutande hemmabioupplevelse
translation.fet-slide-6-body-duke: Flytta snabbt tv-ljudet från en kompatibel Sonossoundbar till Sonos Ace och kliv in i din egen biosalong. Rymligt ljud med Dolby Atmos omsluter dig av detaljerat ljud från alla håll och dynamisk huvudspårning gör upplevelsen oemotståndligt interaktiv.
translation.fet-cinematic-experience: Visa på tv:n för bioupplevelse
translation.fet-overlay-ace: Ta på dig Sonos Ace för att få en personlig lyssningsupplevelse
translation.fet-feature-microphones-arcultra: Fjärrfältsmikrofonerna använder avancerad strålformning och flerkanalig ekoreducering för att ge snabb och korrekt röststyrning och Trueplayjustering. Stäng av med mikrofonreglaget.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-a: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Atmos (Dolby Digital Plus), Dolby Atmos*, Dolby TrueHD*, Dolby Atmos (True HD)*, flerkanalig PCM*, Dolby flerkanalig PCM*, DTS Digital Surround**. Skärmen Spelar nu i Sonosappen visar vilken typ av ljud som avkodas.
* HDMI eARC-anslutning krävs. ** Indikerar inte en licensierad avkodare.
translation.fet-slide-1-headline-arcultra: Ljud som är mer än omslutande
translation.fet-header-intro-arcultra: En soundbar utan motstycke. Med banbrytande Sound Motion™-teknik.
translation.fet-description-arcultra: Arc Ultra ger underhållningen liv på ett sätt som ingen annan soundbar klarar. Upplev klarare toner än någonsin tidigare, oslagbart djup och exakt återgivet ljud som placerar dig mitt i musiken – allt i en elegant design som är möjlig tack vare banbrytande Sound Motion™-teknik.
translation.fet-feature-sound-motion-arcultra: Med Sound Motion™ finns det plats för oslagbar prestanda i en ofattbart platt, kompakt modell. Två vibrationshämmande membran och fyra distribuerade motorer skapar låga frekvenser nästan helt utan mekaniska vibrationer.
translation.fet-feature-speech-enhancement-arcultra: Välj hur tydlig du vill att dialogen ska vara i Sonosappen.
translation.fet-feature-night-sound-arcultra: Aktivera den här inställningen i Sonosappen för att göra högljudda effekter mindre intensiva och framhäva tystare ljud.
translation.fet-feature-tv-audio-swap-arcultra: Flytta tv-ljudet mellan soundbaren och Sonos Ace-hörlurarna.
translation.fet-feature-voice-arcultra: Fungerar med Sonos Voice Control och Amazon Alexa. Rösttjänsternas tillgänglighet varierar mellan olika länder och språk.
translation.fet-feature-dimensions-arcultra:
Höjd: 75 mm
Bredd: 1 178 mm
Djup: 110,6 mm
translation.fet-feature-mounting-m5x08mm: M5 x 0,8 mm gängstigning, längd 6,5 mm
translation.fet-feature-controls-arcultra: Använd de kapacitiva touchkontrollerna för att spela upp, pausa, hoppa över en låt, spela samma låt igen, justera volymen, stänga av röstassistenter och gruppera eller avgruppera Sonosprodukter.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-arcultra-1: Dolby Atmos-innehåll och en kompatibel tv-apparat krävs. Streama Dolby Atmos-musik från en kompatibel tjänst. Se faq.sonos.com/sonos-arc-ultra/atmos för ytterligare information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-arcultra-2: Rösttjänsters tillgänglighet varierar mellan olika länder och språk.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-arcultra-3: HDMI-kabel medföljer. Optisk adapter säljs separat.
translation.fet-card-sub4: Sub 4 frigör Sonosljudets fulla kraft och ger fyllig bas som gör det ännu lättare att leva sig in i handlingen och musiken.
translation.fet-sub4-description: Sub 4 frigör Sonosljudets fulla kraft. Anslut den här subwoofern till en soundbar eller högtalare från Sonos för att få pulshöjande bas som gör det ännu lättare att leva sig in i filmer, tv-program och musik. Den stilrena designen har fått en ny matt finish och innehåller vibrationsdämpande woofers som eliminerar i princip all förvrängning.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-sub4: Två digitala klass D-förstärkare som är perfekt justerade efter subwooferns unika akustiska konstruktion.
translation.fet-feature-woofers-sub4: Två woofers på 5 x 8 tum är vända inåt för att ge en vibrationsdämpande effekt som i princip eliminerar förvrängning.
translation.fet-feature-architecture-sub4: Portförsett hölje stärker basresponsen.
translation.fet-feature-eq-sub4: Ljudinställningarna justeras automatiskt för att skapa balans mellan Sub 4 och parkopplade Sonosprodukter. Använd Sonosappen för att justera bas, diskant och loudness.
translation.fet-feature-dimensions-sub4:
Höjd: 389 mm
Bredd: 402 mm
Djup: 158 mm
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-100-era-300-1: Högtalaren måste installeras via Wi-Fi med Sonosappen innan du kan spela upp ljud.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-100-era-300-2: USB-C-linjeingång kräver en 3,5 mm AUX-kabel och Sonos linjeingångsadapter, båda säljs separat. Den här typen av anslutning är inte avsedd för tv-apparater.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-300-3: Streama Dolby Atmos-musik via Wi-Fi med en kompatibel tjänst och innehåll som stöds. Lyssna på Dolby Atmos-innehåll på hemmabion med en kompatibel tv och en HDMI eARC- eller HDMI ARC-anslutning. Du hittar mer information på https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-1: Uppskattning för kontinuerlig uppspelning på måttlig volym med Wi-Fi-anslutning och aktiverad röstassistent. Batteritiden påverkas av anslutning, inställningar, omgivning och andra faktorer.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-2: Högtalaren måste installeras via Wi-Fi med Sonosappen innan du kan spela upp ljud.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-3: USB-C-linjeingång kräver en 3,5 mm AUX-kabel och Sonos linjeingångsadapter, båda säljs separat.
translation.fet-feature-charging-ace: Ladda med den medföljande USB-C-kabeln och en kompatibel nätadapter. Snabbladdning från 0 % ger tre timmars lyssningstid på tre minuter. Att ladda fullständigt från 0 % tar upp till tre timmar.⁴
translation.fet-feature-usbc-prima: Ladda mobilen när du är i farten eller anslut till en ljudkälla med en AUX-kabel och Sonos linjeingångsadapter. Anslut till routern med en nätverkskabel och Sonos kombinerade adapter (alla tillbehör säljs separat).
translation.fet-feature-tv-audio-swap-ace: Tryck på innehållsknappen för att flytta ljudet från utvalda Sonossoundbars till Sonos Ace.

translation.fet-badge-spatial-audio-with-dynamic-hea: Spatial audio with dynamic head tracking¹
translation.fet-feature-precisely-angled-silk-dome-t: Precisely angled silk-dome tweeters
translation.fet-feature-microphones-arc-beam: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-era100-move2: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control and automatic Trueplay tuning.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-roam2: The beamforming microphone system uses multichannel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control plus automatic Trueplay tuning.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-ace: Eight microphones for Active Noise Cancellation, voice targeting and background noise suppression.
translation.fet-feature-full-on-immersion-ace: Meticulously engineered and tuned by the most discerning ears in the industry, Sonos Ace creates the deepest connection to sound. Each custom-designed component combines with our advanced software to surround you with the highest-fidelity audio. From crystal-clear highs to powerful lows, every note feels more profound.
translation.fet-feature-extreme-clarity-ace: Positioned to deliver the most balanced sound profile and distortionless playback, the dynamic driver produces each frequency with impeccable precision and accuracy.
translation.fet-feature-superior-bass-ace: The ported acoustic architecture enhances the bass response of each driver to reveal all the richness and depth in your favourite songs.
translation.fet-feature-every-detail-ace: Pick up on every nuanced note and beat in your music when you stream lossless audio over Bluetooth® or via USB-C.²
translation.fet-feature-get-lost: Get lost in your listening experience
translation.fet-feature-get-lost-ace: World-class ANC uses an array of optimally positioned microphones to finely pinpoint and neutralise external sounds for maximum immersion.
translation.fet-feature-stay-in-tune-with-your-surro: Stay in tune with your surroundings
With the press of a button, Aware mode lets in ambient sounds so you can hear what’s going on around you and listen to your music. It’s the best fidelity of both worlds.
translation.fet-feature-adjustable-eq-description: Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-arc-beam-ray: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the soundbar. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-subs: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes your Sonos system. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-five: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the speaker. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-trueplay-arcultra-era100-era: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the EQ. Compatible with iOS and Android devices.
translation.fet-feature-automatic-trueplay-move2: This software continuously adjusts the speaker's sound for its environment and audio content.
translation.fet-feature-automatic-trueplay-roam2: This software continuously adjusts the speaker's sound for its environment and audio content. Speaker must be registered in the Sonos app to enable feature.
translation.fet-feature-speech-enhancement-arc-beam-: Turn this setting on in the Sonos app to boost voice frequencies and clarify dialogue.
translation.fet-feature-night-sound-description: Turn this setting on in the Sonos app to reduce the intensity of loud sounds and increase the level of quieter sounds.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-a: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Atmos (Dolby Digital Plus), Dolby Atmos*, Dolby TrueHD*, Dolby Atmos (True HD)*, Multichannel PCM*, Dolby Multichannel PCM*, DTS Digital Surround** (*HDMI eARC connection required. **This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.) The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-r: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital 5.1*, and DTS Digital Surround* (*This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.) The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
translation.fet-feature-passive-radiators-descriptio: Three passive radiators enhance low frequencies for balanced, powerful sound.
translation.fet-feature-bass-reflex-system-ray: Proprietary low-velocity port design minimises distortion and rounds out low-end frequencies.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-sub: Both Class-D digital amplifiers have been perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-submini: Both Class-D digital amplifiers are perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-ports-sub: Dual acoustic ports have been precisely tuned to enhance performance.
translation.fet-feature-eq-sub: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub and the paired Sonos speaker(s) or component. Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-eq-gravity: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub Mini and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-woofers-gravity: Dual 6" woofers face inward for a force-cancelling effect.
translation.fet-feature-architecture-submini: Sealed cabinet neutralises distortion and enhances bass response.
translation.fet-feature-sealed-architecture-five: The sealed cabinet eliminates reverberation, echo and distortion.
translation.fet-feature-sound-swap-roam2-old: Hold the Play/Pause button to send sound between Roam and the nearest Sonos product in your system.
translation.fet-feature-sound-swap-roam2: Hold the Play/Pause button to send sound between Sonos Roam 2 and your nearest Sonos product with microphones.
translation.fet-feature-controls-beam: Use the capacitive touch controls on the product to play, pause, skip, replay, adjust the volume, turn off the microphones and more.
translation.fet-feature-controls-ray: Use the capacitive touch controls on the product to adjust the volume, play, pause, skip and replay.
translation.fet-feature-led-arcultra-era100-era300: Lights on the product indicate connection, microphone activity and mute status.
translation.fet-feature-led-five-move2: Light on the product indicates connection, mute status and errors.
translation.fet-feature-leds-roam2: Lights on the product indicate connection, charge status, mute status, microphone activation and errors.
translation.fet-select-to-hear: Select an experience to hear architectural speakers
translation.fet-select-to-start-listening: Select a speaker to begin listening
translation.fet-card-arc: Bring all your entertainment to life with breathtakingly realistic sound and the 3D experience of Dolby Atmos.
translation.fet-card-arcultra: Featuring breakthrough Sound Motion™ technology, this soundbar brings your home entertainment to life with superior clarity, depth, and dimension.
translation.fet-card-beam: Enrich all your entertainment with the latest generation of our compact smart soundbar, now with Dolby Atmos.
translation.fet-card-ray: Upgrade your TV, music, and gaming experiences with this impressively compact and easy-to-use soundbar.
translation.fet-card-sub: Hear and feel the difference when you add Sub to a room in your Sonos system.
translation.fet-card-gravity: Deepen your enjoyment of TV, music, and more with bold bass when you pair Sub Mini with Beam, Ray, Era 100, One, or One SL.
translation.fet-card-five: Elevate your listening experience with vividly clear and spacious stereo sound.
translation.fet-card-optimo1: Featuring next-gen acoustics and new levels of connectivity, Era 100 transforms any room with the finely tuned stereo sound and rich bass your music deserves.
translation.fet-card-optimo2: With next-level audio that hits from every direction, Era 300 doesn’t just surround you, it puts you inside your music.
translation.fet-card-prima: Upgraded inside and out, Move 2 is a portable powerhouse that puts heart-pumping stereo sound wherever you want it.
translation.fet-card-move: Get bold sound that moves you and moves with you with this powerful, durable and versatile smart speaker.
translation.fet-card-roam: Experience size-defying sound at home and on the go with this lightweight, outdoor-ready portable smart speaker.
translation.fet-card-roam2: Astonishingly lightweight, durable, and powerful, Roam 2 makes it easy to enjoy Sonos sound everywhere life takes you.
translation.fet-card-duke: Obsessively crafted and masterfully tuned, these headphones make you feel at one with the sounds that matter most to you.
translation.fet-card-roamsl: Experience size-defying sound at home and on the go with this lightweight, outdoor-ready portable speaker.
translation.fet-about-1-description: Each speaker is thoroughly designed from the inside out, then fine-tuned by award-winning creators.
translation.fet-about-2-description: Stream music and more from all your favourite services, and get incredible sound for TV or even vinyl.
translation.fet-about-3-description: Mix and match speakers to build the system you want over time. Everything works together over WiFi.
translation.fet-about-4-description: Breeze through setup and control your system with the Sonos app, and use your voice and Apple AirPlay 2.

translation.fet-feature-join-button-description: Press once to add Sub to your system during setup.
translation.fet-feature-bluetooth-button-description: Press to pair with a Bluetooth device.
translation.fet-feature-mic-switch-description: Toggle off this switch on the back of the product to disconnect all power to the microphone hardware.
translation.fet-feature-ip56-description: Protected from dust and high-pressure water streams
translation.fet-feature-ip67-description: Dustproof and waterproof (speaker can be submerged in 3 ft/1 m of water for up to 30 minutes.)

Press once to answer a call 
Press twice to skip a track 
Press three times to play previous track 
Long-press to decline a call

Press to switch between Active Noise Cancellation and Aware mode
Long-press to activate voice assistant

translation.fet-feature-infrared-ir-receiver-beam-ra: Syncs the soundbar with your TV remote for streamlined control
translation.fet-feature-voltage-auto-switching-100-2: Auto-switching 100-240V 50/60Hz AC universal input
translation.fet-feature-apple-airplay2-description: Works with AirPlay 2 on Apple devices iOS 11.4 and higher
translation.fet-feature-apple-airplay2-on-wifi: Works with AirPlay 2 on Apple devices iOS 11.4 and higher on WiFi
translation.fet-feature-voice-beam: Works with Sonos Voice Control, Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant
translation.fet-feature-voice-era-100-era-300: Works with Sonos Voice Control and Amazon Alexa. Availability of services varies by language and country.
translation.fet-feature-voice-prima: Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant on WiFi. Use Sonos Voice Control on WiFi and for essential playback while streaming over Bluetooth.
translation.fet-feature-tv-compatibility-description: Not compatible with CCFL-backlit TVs (manufactured 2004-2012)
translation.fet-feature-battery-roam2: 18Wh battery provides up to 10 hours of continuous playback on a single charge at moderate volumes.
translation.fet-feature-battery-prima: 44Wh battery provides up to 24 hours of continuous playback on a single charge.
translation.fet-feature-charging-roam2: Use the included USB-C to C charging cable with a 10W or higher power adapter. You can also use the Sonos Roam Wireless Charger or a Qi-certified wireless charger.
translation.fet-feature-charging-prima: Use the included Wireless Charging Base or a compatible USB-C PD charger.
translation.fet-arc-description: Put yourself at the centre of shows, films and games with crystal-clear dialogue and two height channels that create an impressive sense of spaciousness. When the TV is off, stream music and more from all your favourite services. Easily control the soundbar with your existing remote, the Sonos app, your voice and Apple AirPlay 2. Build out a full surround system with a subwoofer and pair of rears, and add more speakers around your home for multi-room listening. Everything works together over WiFi.
translation.fet-beam-description: Enjoy crystal-clear dialogue for TV shows, films and games, and stream music from all your favourite services. Advanced processing unlocks spatial audio, creating a virtual surround sound experience with Dolby Atmos.¹ Get set up in minutes and easily control Beam with the Sonos app, your TV remote, and your voice.² Add a subwoofer and rear speakers at any time for more immersive surround sound. Easily create a connected system for your whole home when you add Sonos speakers to more rooms.
translation.fet-five-description: Elevate your listening experience with vividly clear and spacious stereo sound. Hear every microtone and feel every drumbeat when you stream the highest resolution formats from your favourite services. Easily connect a turntable, CD player, or other source with Five's built-in 3.5 mm audio input. Mix and match Sonos speakers around your home for multi-room listening. Everything works together over WiFi.
translation.fet-gravity-description: Deepen your enjoyment of TV, music, and more with bold bass when you pair Sub Mini with Beam, Ray, Era 100, One, or One SL. Place it anywhere in the room, breeze through setup with help from the Sonos app, and experience richer, more immersive sound without any buzz.
translation.fet-prima-description: Unleash your listening experience with Move 2. Upgraded inside and out, this portable powerhouse puts heart-pumping stereo sound wherever you want it. Enjoy up to 24 hours of non-stop playback.¹ Rated IP56, this speaker is both dust and water resistant, making it perfect for outdoor use. When you need to charge the battery, simply set Move 2 on the included Wireless Charging Base.
translation.fet-optimo1-description: Easily play all your audio content using WiFi and Bluetooth®.¹ Connect your turntable or other device using an auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter.² Enjoy hands-free control with your voice. Pair two in the same room for even richer stereo sound or immersive home theatre surround sound. Add more Sonos speakers around your home for amazing sound in every room.
translation.fet-optimo2-description: Feel more connected to all your audio content with phenomenally clear and spacious sound. Stream from all your favourite services and devices with WiFi and Bluetooth.¹ Connect a turntable or other audio source using an auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter.² Experience mind-bendingly realistic surround sound when you pair two Era 300 speakers with Arc or Arc Ultra and stream spatial audio with Dolby Atmos.³ Set up is easy, and control is even easier with the Sonos app, next-generation touch controls, and your voice.
translation.fet-ray-description: Experience precisely balanced sound, including crisp dialogue and solid bass, plus streamlined control with your TV remote, the Sonos app, Apple Airplay2, and more. It only takes two cables and a few minutes to get set up, and the forward-facing acoustics make Ray ideal for an enclosed space, like a shelf in your TV stand. Enjoy the flexibility to create the Sonos system you want over time when you add speakers for surround sound and multi-room listening
translation.fet-roam2-description: Astonishingly lightweight, durable, and powerful, Roam 2 makes it easy to enjoy Sonos sound everywhere life takes you. Just pair, play, and go. Enjoy up to 10 hours of size-defying clarity and bass.¹ Fully IP67 waterproof and dustproof, Roam 2 is ready for the outdoors². Connect to WiFi at home with the Sonos app to unlock more features and use it as a smart speaker.³
translation.fet-duke-description: Sonos Ace perfects your personal listening experience. Feel every frequency with superior precision and clarity. Maximise your immersion with lossless streaming, spatial audio with dynamic head tracking and world-class Active Noise Cancellation. Hear what’s going on around you with Aware mode. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life, exceptional comfort and flawlessly clear calls.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-beam-1: Stream Dolby Atmos Music with selected songs from supported services. Experience Dolby Atmos home theatre content with a compatible TV and HDMI eARC or HDMI ARC connection. Refer to https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-beam-2: Availability of voice services varies by country and language.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-optimo1-optimo2-1: Stream Dolby Atmos Music with selected songs from supported services. Experience Dolby Atmos home theatre content with a compatible TV and HDMI eARC or HDMI ARC connection. Refer to https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-optimo1-optimo2-2: Availability of voice services varies by country and language.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-optimo1-optimo2-3: Stream Dolby Atmos Music over WiFi with a supported service and content. Refer to https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-5: Requires the Sonos app and a compatible Sonos soundbar. See faq.sonos.com/sonos-ace/tv-swap for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-1: Sonos Ace must be registered in the Sonos app to enable head tracking. Spatial audio requires a compatible device and content. See faq.sonos.com/spatial-requirements for details.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-2: Lossless audio requires a compatible device and content. See faq.sonos.com/lossless-requirements for details.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-3: Battery life varies by use, settings, and other factors.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-4: Rapid charging from 0% battery life delivers approximately 3 hours of listening or talk time in 3 minutes.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-roam2-2: Speaker can be submerged in 1 metre of water for up to 30 minutes.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-roam2-1: Estimated for moderate volume levels. Battery life varies by use, settings, environment, and other factors.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-roam2-3: Sonos app and WiFi required to enable. Not all features available on Bluetooth
translation.fet-sub-description: Discern every detail in the music and feel goosebumps when watching TV and films. Get set up in minutes using the Sonos app. It takes care of connecting Sub to your system over WiFi so you can place it anywhere in the room. Stand it upright lying flat and slide it under your sofa to enjoy powerful bass without any distortion.
translation.fet-amp-description: Use Trueplay™ to tune the speakers to the unique acoustics of your space. Mix and match Sonos speakers around your home and enjoy immersive multi-room sound for music, TV, films and more. Everything works together over WiFi and control is simple with the Sonos app and Apple AirPlay 2.
translation.fet-header-intro-duke: Meet Sonos Ace. Everything your headphones should be.
translation.fet-slide-2-body-duke: Experience a deeper connection to your music when you stream lossless audio over Bluetooth® or USB-C. Lose yourself in your listening experience with hyperrealistic spatial audio that surrounds you.
translation.fet-slide-3-headline-duke: All the sounds you want, none of the noise you don't
translation.fet-slide-3-body-duke: World-class Active Noise Cancellation pinpoints and neutralises external sounds for maximum immersion. Turn on Aware mode to hear what’s going on around you
translation.fet-slide-4-body-duke: Plush memory foam ear cushions create an exceptional acoustic seal and minimise pressure. The extendable stainless steel band and rotating ear cups adjust for a bespoke fit.
translation.fet-slide-5-body-duke: Beamforming microphones target your voice and suppress background noises so every word you say comes through crisp and clear.
translation.fet-slide-6-headline-duke: The most precise and immersive home theatre experience
translation.fet-slide-6-body-duke: Instantly swap TV audio from a compatible Sonos soundbar to Sonos Ace and feel transported to your own private cinema. Spatial audio with Dolby Atmos envelops you in dramatically detailed sound from all directions, and dynamic head tracking turns listening into a uniquely interactive experience.
translation.fet-cinematic-experience: View the TV for a cinematic experience.
translation.fet-overlay-ace: Put on Sonos Ace to switch to personal listening
translation.fet-feature-microphones-arcultra: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control and Trueplay tuning. Disconnect by toggling off the mic switch.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-a: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Atmos (Dolby Digital Plus), Dolby Atmos*, Dolby TrueHD*, Dolby Atmos (True HD)*, Multichannel PCM*, Dolby Multichannel PCM*, DTS Digital Surround**. The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
*HDMI eARC connection required. **This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.
translation.fet-header-intro-arcultra: The soundbar, reinvented. Featuring breakthrough Sound Motion™ technology.
translation.fet-description-arcultra: Arc Ultra brings your entertainment to life like no other soundbar. Experience unprecedentedly clear, deep, and balanced sound that precisely surrounds you from every direction — all with an unbelievably sleek design made possible by breakthrough Sound Motion™ technology.
translation.fet-feature-sound-motion-arcultra: Sound Motion™ packs unprecedented performance in an unbelievably flat, compact design. Dual force-cancelling membranes and four distributed motors unleash low frequencies with virtually no mechanical vibration.
translation.fet-feature-speech-enhancement-arcultra: Choose your preferred level of dialogue clarity in the Sonos app.
translation.fet-feature-night-sound-arcultra: Turn this setting on in the Sonos app to reduce the intensity of loud sounds and enhance quieter sounds.
translation.fet-feature-tv-audio-swap-arcultra: Swap TV audio between the soundbar and Sonos Ace headphones.
translation.fet-feature-voice-arcultra: Works with Sonos Voice Control and Amazon Alexa. Availability of voice assistants varies by language and country.

translation.fet-card-sub4: Sub 4 unlocks the full power of Sonos sound, delivering powerful bass to immerse you even deeper in every scene and song.
translation.fet-sub4-description: Sub 4 unlocks the full power of Sonos sound. Pair this subwoofer with your Sonos soundbar or speaker for pulse-pounding bass that immerses you even deeper in films, TV, and music. Updated with a matte finish, the iconic design features dual force-cancelling woofers that virtually eliminate distortion.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-sub4: Dual Class-D digital amplifiers perfectly tuned to the subwoofer's unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-woofers-sub4: Dual 5" x 8" elliptical woofers face inward for a force-cancelling effect that virtually eliminates distortion.
translation.fet-feature-architecture-sub4: Ported cabinet enhances bass response.
translation.fet-feature-eq-sub4: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub 4 and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.

translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-100-era-300-1: Speaker must be set up on WiFi with the Sonos app to play audio.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-100-era-300-2: USB-C line-in requires a 3.5 mm auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter, both sold separately. This type of connection is not intended for TV.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-300-3: Stream Dolby Atmos Music over WiFi with a supported service and content. Experience Dolby Atmos home theatre content with a compatible TV and HDMI eARC or HDMI ARC connection. Refer to https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-1: Estimated for continuous playback at moderate volume while connected to WiFi with voice assistant enabled. Battery life depends on connection, settings, environment, and other factors.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-2: Speaker must be set up over WiFi with the Sonos app before playing audio.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-3: USB-C line-in requires a 3.5 mm auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter, both sold separately.
translation.fet-feature-charging-ace: Charge with included USB-C cable and a compatible power adapter. Rapid charge provides 3 hours listening time in 3 minutes from 0%. Complete charge from 0% requires up to 3 hours.⁴
translation.fet-feature-usbc-prima: Charge your phone on the go, or connect to an audio source using an auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter. Connect your router with an Ethernet cable and the Sonos Combo Adapter (all accessories sold separately).
translation.fet-feature-tv-audio-swap-ace: Press the Content Key to swap sound from select Sonos soundbars to Sonos Ace.

translation.fet-badge-spatial-audio-with-dynamic-hea: Spatial audio with dynamic head tracking¹
translation.fet-feature-precisely-angled-silk-dome-t: Precisely angled silk-dome tweeters
translation.fet-feature-microphones-arc-beam: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-era100-move2: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control and automatic Trueplay tuning.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-roam2: The beamforming microphone system uses multichannel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control plus automatic Trueplay tuning.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-ace: Eight microphones for Active Noise Cancellation, voice targeting and background noise suppression.
translation.fet-feature-full-on-immersion-ace: Meticulously engineered and tuned by the most discerning ears in the industry, Sonos Ace creates the deepest connection to sound. Each custom-designed component combines with our advanced software to surround you with the highest-fidelity audio. From crystal-clear highs to powerful lows, every note feels more profound.
translation.fet-feature-extreme-clarity-ace: Positioned to deliver the most balanced sound profile and distortionless playback, the dynamic driver produces each frequency with impeccable precision and accuracy.
translation.fet-feature-superior-bass-ace: The ported acoustic architecture enhances the bass response of each driver to reveal all the richness and depth in your favourite songs.
translation.fet-feature-every-detail-ace: Pick up on every nuanced note and beat in your music when you stream lossless audio over Bluetooth® or via USB-C.²
translation.fet-feature-get-lost: Get lost in your listening experience
translation.fet-feature-get-lost-ace: World-class ANC uses an array of optimally positioned microphones to finely pinpoint and neutralise external sounds for maximum immersion.
translation.fet-feature-stay-in-tune-with-your-surro: Stay in tune with your surroundings
With the press of a button, Aware mode lets in ambient sounds so you can hear what’s going on around you and listen to your music. It’s the best fidelity of both worlds.
translation.fet-feature-adjustable-eq-description: Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-arc-beam-ray: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the soundbar. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-subs: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes your Sonos system. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-five: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the speaker. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-trueplay-arcultra-era100-era: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the EQ. Compatible with iOS and Android devices.
translation.fet-feature-automatic-trueplay-move2: This software continuously adjusts the speaker's sound for its environment and audio content.
translation.fet-feature-automatic-trueplay-roam2: This software continuously adjusts the speaker's sound for its environment and audio content. Speaker must be registered in the Sonos app to enable feature.
translation.fet-feature-speech-enhancement-arc-beam-: Turn this setting on in the Sonos app to boost voice frequencies and clarify dialogue.
translation.fet-feature-night-sound-description: Turn this setting on in the Sonos app to reduce the intensity of loud sounds and increase the level of quieter sounds.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-a: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Atmos (Dolby Digital Plus), Dolby Atmos*, Dolby TrueHD*, Dolby Atmos (True HD)*, Multichannel PCM*, Dolby Multichannel PCM*, DTS Digital Surround** (*HDMI eARC connection required. **This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.) The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-r: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital 5.1*, and DTS Digital Surround* (*This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.) The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
translation.fet-feature-passive-radiators-descriptio: Three passive radiators enhance low frequencies for balanced, powerful sound.
translation.fet-feature-bass-reflex-system-ray: Proprietary low-velocity port design minimises distortion and rounds out low-end frequencies.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-sub: Both Class-D digital amplifiers have been perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-submini: Both Class-D digital amplifiers are perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-ports-sub: Dual acoustic ports have been precisely tuned to enhance performance.
translation.fet-feature-eq-sub: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub and the paired Sonos speaker(s) or component. Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-eq-gravity: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub Mini and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-woofers-gravity: Dual 6" woofers face inward for a force-cancelling effect.
translation.fet-feature-architecture-submini: Sealed cabinet neutralises distortion and enhances bass response.
translation.fet-feature-sealed-architecture-five: The sealed cabinet eliminates reverberation, echo and distortion.
translation.fet-feature-sound-swap-roam2-old: Hold the Play/Pause button to send sound between Roam and the nearest Sonos product in your system.
translation.fet-feature-sound-swap-roam2: Hold the Play/Pause button to send sound between Sonos Roam 2 and your nearest Sonos product with microphones.
translation.fet-feature-controls-beam: Use the capacitive touch controls on the product to play, pause, skip, replay, adjust the volume, turn off the microphones and more.
translation.fet-feature-controls-ray: Use the capacitive touch controls on the product to adjust the volume, play, pause, skip and replay.
translation.fet-feature-led-arcultra-era100-era300: Lights on the product indicate connection, microphone activity and mute status.
translation.fet-feature-led-five-move2: Light on the product indicates connection, mute status and errors.
translation.fet-feature-leds-roam2: Lights on the product indicate connection, charge status, mute status, microphone activation and errors.
translation.fet-select-to-hear: Select an experience to hear architectural speakers
translation.fet-select-to-start-listening: Select a speaker to begin listening
translation.fet-card-arc: Bring all your entertainment to life with breathtakingly realistic sound and the 3D experience of Dolby Atmos.
translation.fet-card-arcultra: Featuring breakthrough Sound Motion™ technology, this soundbar brings your home entertainment to life with superior clarity, depth, and dimension.
translation.fet-card-beam: Enrich all your entertainment with the latest generation of our compact smart soundbar, now with Dolby Atmos.
translation.fet-card-ray: Upgrade your TV, music, and gaming experiences with this impressively compact and easy-to-use soundbar.
translation.fet-card-sub: Hear and feel the difference when you add Sub to a room in your Sonos system.
translation.fet-card-gravity: Deepen your enjoyment of TV, music, and more with bold bass when you pair Sub Mini with Beam, Ray, Era 100, One, or One SL.
translation.fet-card-five: Elevate your listening experience with vividly clear and spacious stereo sound.
translation.fet-card-optimo1: Featuring next-gen acoustics and new levels of connectivity, Era 100 transforms any room with the finely tuned stereo sound and rich bass your music deserves.
translation.fet-card-optimo2: With next-level audio that hits from every direction, Era 300 doesn’t just surround you, it puts you inside your music.
translation.fet-card-prima: Upgraded inside and out, Move 2 is a portable powerhouse that puts heart-pumping stereo sound wherever you want it.
translation.fet-card-move: Get bold sound that moves you and moves with you with this powerful, durable and versatile smart speaker.
translation.fet-card-roam: Experience size-defying sound at home and on the go with this lightweight, outdoor-ready portable smart speaker.
translation.fet-card-roam2: Astonishingly lightweight, durable, and powerful, Roam 2 makes it easy to enjoy Sonos sound everywhere life takes you.
translation.fet-card-duke: Obsessively crafted and masterfully tuned, these headphones make you feel at one with the sounds that matter most to you.
translation.fet-card-roamsl: Experience size-defying sound at home and on the go with this lightweight, outdoor-ready portable speaker.
translation.fet-about-1-description: Each speaker is thoroughly designed from the inside out, then fine-tuned by award-winning creators.
translation.fet-about-2-description: Stream music and more from all your favourite services, and get incredible sound for TV or even vinyl.
translation.fet-about-3-description: Mix and match speakers to build the system you want over time. Everything works together over WiFi.
translation.fet-about-4-description: Breeze through setup and control your system with the Sonos app, and use your voice and Apple AirPlay 2.

translation.fet-feature-infrared-ir-receiver-beam-ra: Syncs the soundbar with your TV remote for streamlined control

translation.fet-feature-apple-airplay2-on-wifi: Works with AirPlay 2 on Apple devices iOS 11.4 and higher on WiFi
translation.fet-feature-voice-beam: Works with Sonos Voice Control, Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant
translation.fet-feature-voice-era-100-era-300: Works with Sonos Voice Control and Amazon Alexa. Availability of services varies by language and country.
translation.fet-feature-voice-prima: Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant on WiFi. Use Sonos Voice Control on WiFi and for essential playback while streaming over Bluetooth.
translation.fet-feature-tv-compatibility-description: Not compatible with CCFL-backlit TVs (manufactured 2004-2012)
translation.fet-feature-battery-roam2: 18Wh battery provides up to 10 hours of continuous playback on a single charge at moderate volumes.
translation.fet-feature-battery-prima: 44Wh battery provides up to 24 hours of continuous playback on a single charge.
translation.fet-feature-charging-roam2: Use the included USB-C to C charging cable with a 10W or higher power adapter. You can also use the Sonos Roam Wireless Charger or a Qi-certified wireless charger.
translation.fet-feature-charging-prima: Use the included Wireless Charging Base or a compatible USB-C PD charger.
translation.fet-arc-description: Put yourself at the centre of shows, films and games with crystal-clear dialogue and two height channels that create an impressive sense of spaciousness. When the TV is off, stream music and more from all your favourite services. Easily control the soundbar with your existing remote, the Sonos app, your voice and Apple AirPlay 2. Build out a full surround system with a subwoofer and pair of rears, and add more speakers around your home for multi-room listening. Everything works together over WiFi.
translation.fet-beam-description: Enjoy crystal-clear dialogue for TV shows, films and games, and stream music from all your favourite services. Advanced processing unlocks spatial audio, creating a virtual surround sound experience with Dolby Atmos.¹ Get set up in minutes and easily control Beam with the Sonos app, your TV remote, and your voice.² Add a subwoofer and rear speakers at any time for more immersive surround sound. Easily create a connected system for your whole home when you add Sonos speakers to more rooms.
translation.fet-five-description: Elevate your listening experience with vividly clear and spacious stereo sound. Hear every microtone and feel every drumbeat when you stream the highest resolution formats from your favourite services. Easily connect a turntable, CD player, or other source with Five's built-in 3.5 mm audio input. Mix and match Sonos speakers around your home for multi-room listening. Everything works together over WiFi.
translation.fet-gravity-description: Deepen your enjoyment of TV, music, and more with bold bass when you pair Sub Mini with Beam, Ray, Era 100, One, or One SL. Place it anywhere in the room, breeze through setup with help from the Sonos app, and experience richer, more immersive sound without any buzz.
translation.fet-prima-description: Unleash your listening experience with Move 2. Upgraded inside and out, this portable powerhouse puts heart-pumping stereo sound wherever you want it. Enjoy up to 24 hours of non-stop playback.¹ Rated IP56, this speaker is both dust and water resistant, making it perfect for outdoor use. When you need to charge the battery, simply set Move 2 on the included Wireless Charging Base.
translation.fet-optimo1-description: Easily play all your audio content using WiFi and Bluetooth®.¹ Connect your turntable or other device using an auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter.² Enjoy hands-free control with your voice. Pair two in the same room for even richer stereo sound or immersive home theatre surround sound. Add more Sonos speakers around your home for amazing sound in every room.
translation.fet-optimo2-description: Feel more connected to all your audio content with phenomenally clear and spacious sound. Stream from all your favourite services and devices with WiFi and Bluetooth.¹ Connect a turntable or other audio source using an auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter.² Experience mind-bendingly realistic surround sound when you pair two Era 300 speakers with Arc or Arc Ultra and stream spatial audio with Dolby Atmos.³ Set up is easy, and control is even easier with the Sonos app, next-generation touch controls, and your voice.
translation.fet-ray-description: Experience precisely balanced sound, including crisp dialogue and solid bass, plus streamlined control with your TV remote, the Sonos app, Apple Airplay2, and more. It only takes two cables and a few minutes to get set up, and the forward-facing acoustics make Ray ideal for an enclosed space, like a shelf in your TV stand. Enjoy the flexibility to create the Sonos system you want over time when you add speakers for surround sound and multi-room listening
translation.fet-roam2-description: Astonishingly lightweight, durable, and powerful, Roam 2 makes it easy to enjoy Sonos sound everywhere life takes you. Just pair, play, and go. Enjoy up to 10 hours of size-defying clarity and bass.¹ Fully IP67 waterproof and dustproof, Roam 2 is ready for the outdoors². Connect to WiFi at home with the Sonos app to unlock more features and use it as a smart speaker.³
translation.fet-duke-description: Sonos Ace perfects your personal listening experience. Feel every frequency with superior precision and clarity. Maximise your immersion with lossless streaming, spatial audio with dynamic head tracking and world-class Active Noise Cancellation. Hear what’s going on around you with Aware mode. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life, exceptional comfort and flawlessly clear calls.

Experience Dolby Atmos home theatre content with a compatible TV and HDMI eARC or HDMI ARC connection. Refer to https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-beam-2: Availability of voice services varies by country and language.

translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-duke-2: Lossless audio requires a compatible device and content. See faq.sonos.com/lossless-requirements for details.

translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-roam2-3: Sonos app and WiFi required to enable. Not all features available on Bluetooth
translation.fet-sub-description: Discern every detail in the music and feel goosebumps when watching TV and films. Get set up in minutes using the Sonos app. It takes care of connecting Sub to your system over WiFi so you can place it anywhere in the room. Stand it upright lying flat and slide it under your sofa to enjoy powerful bass without any distortion.
translation.fet-amp-description: Use Trueplay™ to tune the speakers to the unique acoustics of your space. Mix and match Sonos speakers around your home and enjoy immersive multi-room sound for music, TV, films and more. Everything works together over WiFi and control is simple with the Sonos app and Apple AirPlay 2.
translation.fet-header-intro-duke: Meet Sonos Ace. Everything your headphones should be.
translation.fet-slide-2-body-duke: Experience a deeper connection to your music when you stream lossless audio over Bluetooth® or USB-C. Lose yourself in your listening experience with hyperrealistic spatial audio that surrounds you.
translation.fet-slide-3-headline-duke: All the sounds you want, none of the noise you don't
translation.fet-slide-3-body-duke: World-class Active Noise Cancellation pinpoints and neutralises external sounds for maximum immersion. Turn on Aware mode to hear what’s going on around you
translation.fet-slide-4-body-duke: Plush memory foam ear cushions create an exceptional acoustic seal and minimise pressure. The extendable stainless steel band and rotating ear cups adjust for a bespoke fit.
translation.fet-slide-5-body-duke: Beamforming microphones target your voice and suppress background noises so every word you say comes through crisp and clear.
translation.fet-slide-6-headline-duke: The most precise and immersive home theatre experience
translation.fet-slide-6-body-duke: Instantly swap TV audio from a compatible Sonos soundbar to Sonos Ace and feel transported to your own private cinema. Spatial audio with Dolby Atmos envelops you in dramatically detailed sound from all directions, and dynamic head tracking turns listening into a uniquely interactive experience.
translation.fet-cinematic-experience: View the TV for a cinematic experience.
translation.fet-overlay-ace: Put on Sonos Ace to switch to personal listening
translation.fet-feature-microphones-arcultra: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control and Trueplay tuning. Disconnect by toggling off the mic switch.

The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
*HDMI eARC connection required. **This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.
translation.fet-header-intro-arcultra: The soundbar, reinvented. Featuring breakthrough Sound Motion™ technology.
translation.fet-description-arcultra: Arc Ultra brings your entertainment to life like no other soundbar. Experience unprecedentedly clear, deep, and balanced sound that precisely surrounds you from every direction — all with an unbelievably sleek design made possible by breakthrough Sound Motion™ technology.
translation.fet-feature-sound-motion-arcultra: Sound Motion™ packs unprecedented performance in an unbelievably flat, compact design. Dual force-cancelling membranes and four distributed motors unleash low frequencies with virtually no mechanical vibration.

translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-arcultra-1: Dolby Atmos content and compatible TV required. Stream Dolby Atmos Music from a supported service. Refer to faq.sonos.com/sonos-arc-ultra/atmos for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-arcultra-2: Availability of voice assistants varies by country and language.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-arcultra-3: HDMI cable included. Optical adapter sold separately.
translation.fet-card-sub4: Sub 4 unlocks the full power of Sonos sound, delivering powerful bass to immerse you even deeper in every scene and song.
translation.fet-sub4-description: Sub 4 unlocks the full power of Sonos sound. Pair this subwoofer with your Sonos soundbar or speaker for pulse-pounding bass that immerses you even deeper in films, TV, and music. Updated with a matte finish, the iconic design features dual force-cancelling woofers that virtually eliminate distortion.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-sub4: Dual Class-D digital amplifiers perfectly tuned to the subwoofer's unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-woofers-sub4: Dual 5" x 8" elliptical woofers face inward for a force-cancelling effect that virtually eliminates distortion.
translation.fet-feature-architecture-sub4: Ported cabinet enhances bass response.
translation.fet-feature-eq-sub4: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub 4 and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-dimensions-sub4:
Height: 389 mm
Width: 402 mm
Depth: 158 mm
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-100-era-300-1: Speaker must be set up on WiFi with the Sonos app to play audio.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-100-era-300-2: USB-C line-in requires a 3.5 mm auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter, both sold separately. This type of connection is not intended for TV.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-era-300-3: Stream Dolby Atmos Music over WiFi with a supported service and content. Experience Dolby Atmos home theatre content with a compatible TV and HDMI eARC or HDMI ARC connection. Refer to https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-on-sonos for more information.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-1: Estimated for continuous playback at moderate volume while connected to WiFi with voice assistant enabled. Battery life depends on connection, settings, environment, and other factors.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-2: Speaker must be set up over WiFi with the Sonos app before playing audio.
translation.fet-footer-disclaimer-prima-3: USB-C line-in requires a 3.5 mm auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter, both sold separately.
translation.fet-feature-charging-ace: Charge with included USB-C cable and a compatible power adapter. Rapid charge provides 3 hours listening time in 3 minutes from 0%. Complete charge from 0% requires up to 3 hours.⁴
translation.fet-feature-usbc-prima: Charge your phone on the go, or connect to an audio source using an auxiliary cable and the Sonos Line-In Adapter. Connect your router with an Ethernet cable and the Sonos Combo Adapter (all accessories sold separately).
translation.fet-feature-tv-audio-swap-ace: Press the Content Key to swap sound from select Sonos soundbars to Sonos Ace.

translation.fet-badge-spatial-audio-with-dynamic-hea: Spatial audio with dynamic head tracking¹
translation.fet-feature-precisely-angled-silk-dome-t: Precisely angled silk-dome tweeters
translation.fet-feature-microphones-arc-beam: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-era100-move2: The far-field microphone array uses advanced beamforming and multi-channel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control and automatic Trueplay tuning.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-roam2: The beamforming microphone system uses multichannel echo cancellation for quick and accurate voice control plus automatic Trueplay tuning.
translation.fet-feature-microphones-ace: Eight microphones for Active Noise Cancellation, voice targeting and background noise suppression.
translation.fet-feature-full-on-immersion-ace: Meticulously engineered and tuned by the most discerning ears in the industry, Sonos Ace creates the deepest connection to sound. Each custom-designed component combines with our advanced software to surround you with the highest-fidelity audio. From crystal-clear highs to powerful lows, every note feels more profound.
translation.fet-feature-extreme-clarity-ace: Positioned to deliver the most balanced sound profile and distortionless playback, the dynamic driver produces each frequency with impeccable precision and accuracy.
translation.fet-feature-superior-bass-ace: The ported acoustic architecture enhances the bass response of each driver to reveal all the richness and depth in your favourite songs.
translation.fet-feature-every-detail-ace: Pick up on every nuanced note and beat in your music when you stream lossless audio over Bluetooth® or via USB-C.²
translation.fet-feature-get-lost: Get lost in your listening experience
translation.fet-feature-get-lost-ace: World-class ANC uses an array of optimally positioned microphones to finely pinpoint and neutralise external sounds for maximum immersion.
translation.fet-feature-stay-in-tune-with-your-surro: Stay in tune with your surroundings
With the press of a button, Aware mode lets in ambient sounds so you can hear what’s going on around you and listen to your music. It’s the best fidelity of both worlds.
translation.fet-feature-adjustable-eq-description: Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-arc-beam-ray: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the soundbar. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-subs: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes your Sonos system. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-true-play-five: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the speaker. Supported iOS device required.
translation.fet-feature-trueplay-arcultra-era100-era: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes the EQ. Compatible with iOS and Android devices.
translation.fet-feature-automatic-trueplay-move2: This software continuously adjusts the speaker's sound for its environment and audio content.
translation.fet-feature-automatic-trueplay-roam2: This software continuously adjusts the speaker's sound for its environment and audio content. Speaker must be registered in the Sonos app to enable feature.
translation.fet-feature-speech-enhancement-arc-beam-: Turn this setting on in the Sonos app to boost voice frequencies and clarify dialogue.
translation.fet-feature-night-sound-description: Turn this setting on in the Sonos app to reduce the intensity of loud sounds and increase the level of quieter sounds.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-a: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Atmos (Dolby Digital Plus), Dolby Atmos*, Dolby TrueHD*, Dolby Atmos (True HD)*, Multichannel PCM*, Dolby Multichannel PCM*, DTS Digital Surround** (*HDMI eARC connection required. **This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.) The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
translation.fet-feature-home-theater-audio-formats-r: Stereo PCM, Dolby Digital 5.1*, and DTS Digital Surround* (*This is not an indication of a licensed decoder.) The Sonos app's Now Playing screen will display what type of audio is being decoded.
translation.fet-feature-passive-radiators-descriptio: Three passive radiators enhance low frequencies for balanced, powerful sound.
translation.fet-feature-bass-reflex-system-ray: Proprietary low-velocity port design minimises distortion and rounds out low-end frequencies.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-sub: Both Class-D digital amplifiers have been perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-amplifiers-submini: Both Class-D digital amplifiers are perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
translation.fet-feature-ports-sub: Dual acoustic ports have been precisely tuned to enhance performance.
translation.fet-feature-eq-sub: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub and the paired Sonos speaker(s) or component. Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-eq-gravity: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub Mini and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble and loudness.
translation.fet-feature-woofers-gravity: Dual 6" woofers face inward for a force-cancelling effect.
translation.fet-feature-architecture-submini: Sealed cabinet neutralises distortion and enhances bass response.
translation.fet-feature-sealed-architecture-five: The sealed cabinet eliminates reverberation, echo and distortion.
translation.fet-feature-sound-swap-roam2-old: Hold the Play/Pause button to send sound between Roam and the nearest Sonos product in your system.
translation.fet-feature-sound-swap-roam2: Hold the Play/Pause button to send sound between Sonos Roam 2 and your nearest Sonos product with microphones.
translation.fet-feature-controls-beam: Use the capacitive touch controls on the product to play, pause, skip, replay, adjust the volume, turn off the microphones and more.
translation.fet-feature-controls-ray: Use the capacitive touch controls on the product to adjust the volume, play, pause, skip and replay.
translation.fet-feature-led-arcultra-era100-era300: Lights on the product indicate connection, microphone activity and mute status.
translation.fet-feature-led-five-move2: Light on the product indicates connection, mute status and errors.
translation.fet-feature-leds-roam2: Lights on the product indicate connection, charge status, mute status, microphone activation and errors.
translation.fet-select-to-hear: Select an experience to hear architectural speakers
translation.fet-select-to-start-listening: Select a speaker to begin listening
translation.fet-card-arc: Bring all your entertainment to life with breathtakingly realistic sound and the 3D experience of Dolby Atmos.
translation.fet-card-arcultra: Featuring breakthrough Sound Motion™ technology, this soundbar brings your home entertainment to life with superior clarity, depth, and dimension.
translation.fet-card-beam: Enrich all your entertainment with the latest generation of our compact smart soundbar, now with Dolby Atmos.
translation.fet-card-ray: Upgrade your TV, music, and gaming experiences with this impressively compact and easy-to-use soundbar.
translation.fet-card-sub: Hear and feel the difference when you add Sub to a room in your Sonos system.
translation.fet-card-gravity: Deepen your enjoyment of TV, music, and more with bold bass when you pair Sub Mini with Beam, Ray, Era 100, One, or One SL.
translation.fet-card-five: Elevate your listening experience with vividly clear and spacious stereo sound.
translation.fet-card-optimo1: Featuring next-gen acoustics and new levels of connectivity, Era 100 transforms any room with the finely tuned stereo sound and rich bass your music deserves.
translation.fet-card-optimo2: With next-level audio that hits from every direction, Era 300 doesn’t just surround you, it puts you inside your music.
translation.fet-card-prima: Upgraded inside and out, Move 2 is a portable powerhouse that puts heart-pumping stereo sound wherever you want it.
translation.fet-card-move: Get bold sound that moves you and moves with you with this powerful, durable and versatile smart speaker.
translation.fet-card-roam: Experience size-defying sound at home and on the go with this lightweight, outdoor-ready portable smart speaker.
translation.fet-card-roam2: Astonishingly lightweight, durable, and powerful, Roam 2 makes it easy to enjoy Sonos sound everywhere life takes you.
translation.fet-card-duke: Obsessively crafted and masterfully tuned, these headphones make you feel at one with the sounds that matter most to you.
translation.fet-card-roamsl: Experience size-defying sound at home and on the go with this lightweight, outdoor-ready portable speaker.
translation.fet-about-1-description: Each speaker is thoroughly designed from the inside out, then fine-tuned by award-winning creators.
translation.fet-about-2-description: Stream music and more from all your favourite services, and get incredible sound for TV or even vinyl.
translation.fet-about-3-description: Mix and match speakers to build the system you want over time. Everything works together over WiFi.
translation.fet-about-4-description: Breeze through setup and control your system with the Sonos app, and use your voice and Apple AirPlay 2.

translation.fet-feature-bluetooth-button-description: Press to pair with a Bluetooth device.
translation.fet-feature-mic-switch-description: Toggle off this switch on the back of the product to disconnect all power to the microphone hardware.
translation.fet-feature-ip56-description: Protected from dust and high-pressure water streams
translation.fet-feature-ip67-description: Dustproof and waterproof (speaker can be submerged in 3 ft/1 m of water for up to 30 minutes.)

Slide up and down for volume control
Press once to play/pause 
Press once to answer a call 
Press twice to skip a track 
Press three times to play previous track 
Long-press to decline a call

Long-press to activate voice assistant
